levels.details: The Memento Web Proxy Server process has been restored to normal operation.
levels.description: Memento: Web Proxy Server process failure cleared
levels.cause: The Memento Web Proxy Server process has been restored to normal operation. The previously issued alarm has been cleared.
levels.effect: Users are able to retrieve their call lists from this Memento server.

levels.details: While this condition persists, all attempts to retrieve call lists from this Memento server will fail, but no call list records will be lost. Monit will automatically attempt to restart the Web Proxy Server process.
levels.description: Memento: Web Proxy Server process failure
levels.cause: The system has detected that the Memento Web Proxy Server process has failed.
levels.effect: Users are unable to retrieve their call lists from this Memento server, but no call list records will be lost.
levels.action: Monitor for the alarm to clear and confirm the system is operating normally. If the failed Memento Web Proxy Server process fails to return to service then contact your support representative.
